languages.text: "Еретик ли я? Фабрикатор-Цензор не считал так. Он навещал меня с инспекцией, но не запретил мои изыскания. Позже, когда таинственный гость открыл его оптике истину, он пришел вновь. Я вырастил для него мусорный код в недрах своего разума — он все еще живет там, разъедает мои синапсы и строит новые связи, открытые новому знанию перемен. Свобода — это ересь? Если да, то я — еретик".

"Am I a heretic? The Fabricator-Censor didn't think so. He conducted inspections, but he did not prohibit my research. Later, when a mysterious visitor revealed the truth to his optics, he came to me once more. I nurtured the scrap-code for him in the depths of my mind. It lives there still, eating through my synapses and building new connections that are open to the new knowledge of change. Is freedom heresy? If so, then I am a heretic."
languages.original_text: "Еретик ли я? Фабрикатор-Цензор не считал так. Он навещал меня с инспекцией, но не запретил мои изыскания. Позже, когда таинственный гость открыл его оптике истину, он пришел вновь. Я вырастил для него мусорный код в недрах своего разума — он все еще живет там, разъедает мои синапсы и строит новые связи, открытые новому знанию перемен. Свобода — это ересь? Если да, то я — еретик".

Later, when a mysterious guest revealed the truth to his optics, he came to me once more. I nurtured the scrap code for him in the depths of my mind. It lives there still, eating through my synapses and building new connections that are open to the new knowledge of change. Is freedom heresy? If so, then I am a heretic."
traits.speaker: PasqalQuest_Dements

languages.text: 「私は異端者か？ファブリケーター・センサーはそう考えなかった。彼は調査をしたが、私の研究を禁止しなかった。その後、謎めいた訪客が真実を彼に知らせた時、彼はもう一度私の元を訪れた。私は彼のために破壊コードを心の深層で大切に管理していた。それはまだそこにあり、私のシナプスを蝕み、変化の新たな知識へと開かれた新しいコネクションを築き上げている。自由とは異端なのか？もしそうであれば、私は異端者だ」
languages.original_text: "Am I a heretic? The Fabricator-Censor didn't think so. He conducted inspections, but he did not prohibit my research. Later, when a mysterious visitor revealed the truth to his optics, he came to me once more. I nurtured the scrap-code for him in the depths of my mind. It lives there still, eating through my synapses and building new connections that are open to the new knowledge of change. Is freedom heresy? If so, then I am a heretic."

traits.locale_text: 「私は異端者か？ファブリケーター・センサーはそう考えなかった。彼は調査をしたが、私の研究を禁止しなかった。その後、謎めいた訪客が真実を彼に知らせた時、彼はもう一度私の元を訪れた。私は彼のために破壊コードを心の深層で大切に管理していた。それはまだそこにあり、私のシナプスを蝕み、変化の新たな知識へと開かれた新しいコネクションを築き上げている。自由とは異端なのか？もしそうであれば、私は異端者だ」
traits.speaker: PasqalQuest_Dements

languages.text: “我是异端分子吗？铸造审查师本人并不这么认为。尽管他进行了检查，但他并没有禁止我的研究。后来，当某位神秘的来访者让他看到了真理之后，他又来找我了。在我的思维深处，我为他培植了一份废码。直到现在，那些废码依然活跃在我的意识深处，吞噬着我的神经突触，建立新的连接，向不断变化的新知识敞开大门。自由是异端邪说吗？如果是的话，那我确实是个异端分子。”
languages.original_text: "Am I a heretic? The Fabricator-Censor didn't think so. He conducted inspections, but he did not prohibit my research. Later, when a mysterious visitor revealed the truth to his optics, he came to me once more. I nurtured the scrap-code for him in the depths of my mind. It lives there still, eating through my synapses and building new connections that are open to the new knowledge of change. Is freedom heresy? If so, then I am a heretic."

traits.locale_text: “我是异端分子吗？铸造审查师本人并不这么认为。尽管他进行了检查，但他并没有禁止我的研究。后来，当某位神秘的客人让他看到了真理之后，他又来找我了。在我的思维深处，我为他培植了一份废码。直到现在，那些废码依然活跃在我的意识深处，吞噬着我的神经突触，建立新的连接，向不断变化的新知识敞开大门。自由是异端邪说吗？如果是的话，那我确实是个异端分子。”
traits.speaker: PasqalQuest_Dements

languages.text: "Bin ich ein Ketzer? Der Fabricator-Zensor sah es nicht so. Er führte Untersuchungen durch, verbot meine Forschung aber nicht. Später, als ein mysteriöser Besucher seiner Optik die Wahrheit zeigte, kam er wieder zu mir. Ich nährte in den Tiefen meines Geists den Schadcode für ihn. Er lebt immer noch dort, frisst sich durch meine Synapsen und erstellt neue Verbindungen, die offen sind für das neue Wissen der Veränderung. Ist Freiheit Ketzerei? Falls ja, bin ich ein Ketzer."
languages.original_text: "Am I a heretic? The Fabricator-Censor didn't think so. He conducted inspections, but he did not prohibit my research. Later, when a mysterious visitor revealed the truth to his optics, he came to me once more. I nurtured the scrap-code for him in the depths of my mind. It lives there still, eating through my synapses and building new connections that are open to the new knowledge of change. Is freedom heresy? If so, then I am a heretic."

traits.locale_text: "Bin ich ein Ketzer? Der Fabricator-Zensor sah es nicht so. Er führte Untersuchungen durch, verbot meine Forschung aber nicht. Später, als ein mysteriöser Gast seiner Optik die Wahrheit zeigte, kam er wieder zu mir. Ich nährte in den Tiefen meines Geists den Schadcode für ihn. Er lebt immer noch dort, frisst sich durch meine Synapsen und erstellt neue Verbindungen, die offen sind für das neue Wissen der Veränderung. Ist Freiheit Ketzerei? Falls ja, bin ich ein Ketzer."
traits.speaker: PasqalQuest_Dements

languages.text: « Suis-je un hérétique ? Le fabricator-censeur n'en a pas jugé ainsi. Il a mené plusieurs inspections, mais il n'a pas interdit mes recherches pour autant. Plus tard, lorsqu'un hôte mystérieux a révélé la vérité à ses optiques, il est revenu me voir. J'ai cultivé l'anticode à son intention dans les profondeurs de mon esprit et il s'y trouve encore à ce jour, rongeant mes synapses et établissant de nouvelles connexions ouvertes aux connaissances inédites issues du changement. Si la liberté est une hérésie, alors, oui, je suis un hérétique. »
languages.original_text: "Am I a heretic? The Fabricator-Censor didn't think so. He conducted inspections, but he did not prohibit my research. Later, when a mysterious visitor revealed the truth to his optics, he came to me once more. I nurtured the scrap-code for him in the depths of my mind. It lives there still, eating through my synapses and building new connections that are open to the new knowledge of change. Is freedom heresy? If so, then I am a heretic."

traits.locale_text: « Suis-je un hérétique ? Le fabricator-censeur n'en a pas jugé ainsi. Il a mené plusieurs inspections, mais il n'a pas interdit mes recherches pour autant. Plus tard, lorsqu'un hôte mystérieux a révélé la vérité à ses optiques, il est revenu me voir. J'ai cultivé l'anticode à son intention dans les profondeurs de mon esprit et il s'y trouve encore à ce jour, rongeant mes synapses et établissant de nouvelles connexions ouvertes aux connaissances inédites issues du changement. Si la liberté constitue une hérésie, alors, oui, je suis un hérétique. »
traits.speaker: PasqalQuest_Dements

languages.text: «¿Que si soy un hereje? Al fabricator-censor no se lo parecí. Llevó a cabo una inspección, pero no prohibió mi investigación. Más adelante, cuando un visitante misterioso reveló la verdad a sus sistemas ópticos, acudió a mí una vez más. Le incubé el código de chatarra en los rincones más profundos de mi mente. Y ahí reside aún, devorando mis sinapsis y forjando nuevas conexiones abiertas al nuevo conocimiento del cambio. ¿Es herética la libertad? En tal caso sí, soy un hereje».
languages.original_text: "Am I a heretic? The Fabricator-Censor didn't think so. He conducted inspections, but he did not prohibit my research. Later, when a mysterious visitor revealed the truth to his optics, he came to me once more. I nurtured the scrap-code for him in the depths of my mind. It lives there still, eating through my synapses and building new connections that are open to the new knowledge of change. Is freedom heresy? If so, then I am a heretic."

traits.locale_text: «¿Que si soy un hereje? Al fabricator-censor no se lo parecí. Llevó a cabo una inspección, pero no prohibió mi investigación. Más adelante, cuando un invitado misterioso reveló la verdad a sus sistemas ópticos, acudió a mí una vez más. Le incubé el código chatarra en los rincones más profundos de mi mente. Y ahí reside aún, devorando mis sinapsis y forjando nuevas conexiones abiertas al nuevo conocimiento del cambio. ¿Es herética la libertad? En tal caso sí, soy un hereje».
traits.speaker: PasqalQuest_Dements

languages.text: "Peki kâfir miyim? Denetçi Fabrikatör, öyle olduğumu düşünmüyor. İncelemede bulundu ve araştırmalarımı yasaklamadı. Gizemli bir ziyaretçi, optiklerine gerçeği açık ettiğindeyse bir kez daha bana geldi. Hurda kodunu onun için zihnimin derinliklerinde besledim. Hâlâ orada yaşıyor, sinapslarımdan besleniyor ve değişimin getirdiği yeni bilgilere açık, yeni bağlantılar kuruyor. Özgürlük kâfirlik midir? Eğer öyleyse kâfirim."
languages.original_text: "Am I a heretic? The Fabricator-Censor didn't think so. He conducted inspections, but he did not prohibit my research. Later, when a mysterious visitor revealed the truth to his optics, he came to me once more. I nurtured the scrap-code for him in the depths of my mind. It lives there still, eating through my synapses and building new connections that are open to the new knowledge of change. Is freedom heresy? If so, then I am a heretic."

traits.locale_text: "Bir kâfir miyim? Denetçi Fabrikatör öyle olduğumu düşünmüyor. İncelemeler gerçekleştirdi ve araştırmalarımı men etmedi. Daha sonraları, gizemli bir ziyaretçi, optiklerine gerçeği açık ettikten sonra bana bir kez daha geldi. Hurda kodunu onun için zihnimin derinliklerinde besledim. Hâlâ orada yaşıyor, sinapslarımdan besleniyor ve değişime dair yeni bilgilere açık durumdaki yeni bağlantılar kuruyor. Özgürlük kâfirlik midir? Eğer öyleyse kâfirim."
traits.speaker: PasqalQuest_Dements
